decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively play creatures like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Emberheart Challenger to deal damage to the opponent while using spells like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage to clear the way. The deck also includes cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Experimental Synthesizer to provide additional value and card advantage. The mana base is built around red and blue lands to ensure the deck can consistently cast its spells and maintain a high tempo throughout the game.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly develop a strong board presence and deal direct damage to the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Monstrous Rage, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of burn spells like Reckless Rage and Torch the Tower provides additional reach to finish off opponents. The deck has a good mix of creatures and spells to maintain a steady stream of damage and secure a victory before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria and Aven Interrupter, supported by mana ramp from Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic. Collected Company allows for quick creature deployment, while Skyclave Apparition provides removal options. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben disrupts the opponent's game plan, while Badgermole Cub and Tyvar, the Pummeler offer additional threats. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board control to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to overwhelm opponents with a fast-paced aggressive strategy. The deck focuses on playing low-cost creatures like Soul-Scar Mage, Monastery Swiftspear, and Emberheart Challenger, supported by spells like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Stock Up and Stormchaser's Talent helps maintain card advantage and provide additional power to the creatures on the board. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off opponents before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Floodpits Drowner to quickly pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Spell Pierce. The deck also utilizes versatile removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to keep the opponent's board under control. By combining efficient threats with disruption and removal, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win through a combination of early aggression and disruption.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with early creature aggression, supported by cards like Collected Company and Skyclave Apparition for value. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben to slow down the opponent's spells. The mana base is built to support the aggressive gameplan with plenty of green sources for early plays. Overall, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and maintain pressure to take control of the game.

The main concept of the deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Skyclave Apparition and Enduring Innocence while generating card advantage with Collected Company. The mana base allows for consistent and fast creature deployment, with ramp from cards like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic. The deck also includes ways to protect key creatures and ensure a strong board presence in the form of Selfless Spirit and Ouroboroid.

The deck focuses on aggressively utilizing cheap and efficient creatures, burn spells, and card draw to apply pressure on the opponent and maintain tempo. It uses a mix of prowess creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Soul-Scar Mage along with spells like Reckless Rage and Stormchaser's Talent to deal direct damage while keeping card advantage with Stock Up and Academic Dispute. The mana base allows for a consistent and fast start, with access to both blue and red mana sources to cast spells and pump up creatures.

This UW Control deck focuses on creating a strong lockdown on the opponent while drawing cards and ramping up. The deck utilizes cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, Dovin's Veto, and Supreme Verdict to control the board and counter the opponent's threats. With the help of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, the deck can generate additional card advantage and value. The deck also includes cards like Memory Deluge and Omen of the Sea for additional card draw and selection. The aim is to outvalue the opponent and control the game until victory.

The deck focuses on using efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria and Skyclave Apparition to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. With cards like Collected Company and Elvish Mystic to ramp up and generate advantage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a aggressive strategy. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben helps to slow down the opponent's spells, while cards like Enduring Innocence and Ouroboroid provide some resilience and staying power. The deck aims to close out the game quickly with its aggressive creatures and disruptive elements.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize low-cost, aggressive creatures like Soul-Scar Mage and Monastery Swiftspear, along with powerful spells like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Academic Dispute and Boomerang Basics to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain tempo. The land base allows for a fast mana curve and the ability to cast spells quickly and efficiently. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and relentless stream of damage.

This deck is focused on quickly playing low-cost creatures and spells to deal damage to the opponent as fast as possible. It utilizes cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Soul-Scar Mage, and Emberheart Challenger to apply pressure early on, while also including burn spells like Reckless Rage and Torch the Tower to remove threats and push through damage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and direct damage spells, prioritizing speed and efficiency to win the game as quickly as possible.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, while disrupting opponents with cards like Skyclave Apparition. The deck also utilizes ramp cards like Elvish Mystic and Llanowar Elves to ensure a fast start. A key strategy is to use Collected Company to dig for additional creatures and overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats. Additionally, cards like Enduring Innocence and Ouroboroid provide resilience and protection against removal spells.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures like Llanowar Elves, Skyclave Apparition, and Aven Interrupter, while disrupting opponents with Archon of Emeria. Collected Company helps to refill the board with additional threats. The mana base is built to provide consistent access to white and green mana sources. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Werefox Bodyguard provide additional disruption, while Badgermole Cub and Ouroboroid offer resilience and versatility. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggression and disruption.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on playing efficient creatures like Archon of Emeria, Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, and Skyclave Apparition to apply pressure on opponents quickly. It also utilizes cards like Collected Company to generate card advantage and tempo. The deck aims to control the board with disruptive creatures and spells while maintaining a fast-paced aggressive strategy to overwhelm opponents. By accelerating mana with cards like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, the deck can deploy threats early and maintain pressure throughout the game.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures and burning spells to pressure the opponent and deal damage efficiently. The deck aims to control the board with removal like Reckless Rage and Monstrous Rage, while also utilizing powerful cards like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Monastery Swiftspear to apply pressure and close out the game quickly. By combining aggressive creatures with direct damage spells, this deck seeks to outpace and overwhelm opponents while maintaining a steady stream of threats.
